meanings.sent1: The birds overwintered in the warm forest.
meanings.sent2: The bears overwintered in their cozy den.
meanings.sent3: The squirrels overwintered in style with their fluffy nests.
meanings.sent4: The flowers overwintered beneath the protective snow blanket.
meanings.sent5: The rabbits overwintered by burrowing deep into the ground.

meanings.sent1: The deer overwintered by finding enough food to last.
meanings.sent2: The foxes overwintered by adapting to the cold weather.
meanings.sent3: The raccoons overwintered by throwing a winter feast.
meanings.sent4: The plants overwintered by storing nutrients in their roots.
meanings.sent5: The insects overwintered by hibernating in their cozy homes.

meanings.definition: To remain alive during the winter
meanings.sent1: The fish overwintered by slowing down their metabolism.
meanings.sent2: The birds overwintered by migrating to warmer regions.
meanings.sent3: The bears overwintered by having a big winter sleep.
meanings.sent4: The trees overwintered by shedding their leaves and conserving energy.
meanings.sent5: The squirrels overwintered by storing nuts in their secret stash.

meanings.sent1: The rabbits overwintered in their underground burrows.
meanings.sent2: The birds overwintered by fluffing up their feathers for warmth.
meanings.sent3: The bears overwintered by throwing a winter party.
meanings.sent4: The plants overwintered by going dormant until spring.
meanings.sent5: The insects overwintered by seeking shelter in cracks and crevices.
